|cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = BMIPS4350 |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 300 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL064A90TFIR3; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = PSC;A3S56D40ETP-G5; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325F; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:26:5A |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = CFE;1.0.37-12.1;BCM96358; |stockos = Linux;2.6.16.14;OpenRG; |exp_if_types = Mini PCI,USB 2.0 |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J4 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL2+,HomePNA (coax) |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = telus |defaultssid = telusXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/03/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Cameo WLG-1308 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4318; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC ID is strictly for the '''[[Cameo]]''' wireless module. :"21514WLG13081A1" and "WLG-1308" is silkscreened on the wireless module's board in the FCC photos. [http://openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dva-g3810bn-tl On the OpenWrt wiki] :BCM6358KFBG SoC :'''Coppergate''' CG3110 chipset on-board for HomePNA support (CG3111 + CG3112) :'''[[Silicon Labs]]''' Si3215 on-board for VoIP support The default SSID format appears to be '''telusXXX''', where '''XXX''' is the last 3 digits of the MAC address on the unit's label (upper case letters). :It would appear the BSSID is randomly generated. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The pinout is per the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki.. 
<---
    to the wireless module

(GND) (RxD)
(GND) (3.3)
(GND) (TxD)

--> to BCM6358
===Info derived from=== {{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
